      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method will be called to check if player control all the territories of particular continent

      This method will check in new turn how many number of army player can get for reinforcement.
      RiskCard RiskPlayInterface.getCardBycardNumberofPlayer(Player player, int cardNumber)
      This method will return particular card whose number is provided from current player risk card list
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> RiskPlayInterface.getCardNumbersFromPlayer(Player player)
      This method will return list of card number current player is having.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> RiskPlayInterface.getContinentControlledByPlayer(Player player, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method will return list of continent whose all countries occupied by given player in given map
      java.lang.String RiskPlayInterface.getPlayerPercentageByCountry(Player player, int totalCountry)
      This method will return percentage string of percentage of map covered by given player
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> RiskPlayInterface.getPlayersCountries(Player player)
      This method will return list of player names of given player
      PlayerTerritory RiskPlayInterface.getPlayerTerritoryByCountryName(java.lang.String country, Player player)
      This method will return whole object of PlayerTerritory of given player based upon given territory(country) name
      PlayerTerritory RiskPlayInterface.getStrongestTerritory(Player player)
      This method finds and returns the strongest territory that the current player
      int RiskPlayInterface.getTotalArmyByPlayer(java.util.List<Player> players, Player currentPlayer)
      This method will return army count of given player
      PlayerTerritory RiskPlayInterface.getWeakestTerritory(Player player)
      This method finds and returns the weakest territory that the current player
      int RiskPlayInterface.newArmyAfterCardExchange(Player player)
      This method will return new army count after every time player exchange cards
      RiskCardExchange RiskPlayInterface.prepareCard(Player currentPlayer)
      This method prepares a CardTrade Object for any Computer Player
      Player RiskPlayInterface.updateArmyAfterCardExchange(Player player)
      This method will update armyCount after card exchange
      void RiskPlayInterface.updateCardList(Player player, java.util.List<RiskCard> freeRiskCards, RiskCardExchange exchangeCard)
      This method updates current player's card list also free card lists after player's exchange cards
      void RiskPlayInterface.updateCardListAfterExchange(Player player, java.util.List<RiskCard> cards, RiskCardExchange exchangedCards)
      This method will be called after card exchange has been done and card need to add again to total card list
      boolean RiskPlayInterface.validateAttackerDice(int dies, java.lang.String fromCountry, Player player)
      This method will validate the number of dice given by attacker
      boolean RiskPlayInterface.validateDefenderDice(int dies, java.lang.String toCountry, Player player)
      This method will validate defender dice given by defender based on army on given country
      boolean RiskPlayInterface.validateFromCountry(java.lang.String fromCountry, Player player)
      This method will validate if given attacker country is owned by given player
      boolean RiskPlayInterface.validateToCountry(java.lang.String fromCountry, java.lang.String toCountry, RiskMap riskMap, Player player)
      This method will validate if given defender country is owned by given player
